mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM RTP_POOLS WHERE 1=1
AND mrws_id LIKE CONCAT('%', #{data.mrws_id}, '%')
AND rtp_local LIKE CONCAT('%', #{data.rtp_local}, '%')
AND rtp_zone LIKE CONCAT('%', #{data.rtp_zone}, '%')
ORDER BY mrws_id ASC LIMIT #{pageable.offset}, #{pageable.pageSize};

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RTP_POOLS WHERE 1=1
AND mrws_id LIKE CONCAT('%', #{data.mrws_id}, '%')
AND rtp_local LIKE CONCAT('%', #{data.rtp_local}, '%')
AND rtp_zone LIKE CONCAT('%', #{data.rtp_zone}, '%')
